# UICollectionViewCell.DragState.lifting

**Case**

The cell is being animated off of the surface of the collection view.

## Declaration

```swift
case lifting
```

## Constants

- **UICollectionViewCell.DragState.none**: The cell isn’t involved in a drag.
- **UICollectionViewCell.DragState.dragging**: The cell is being dragged.
